```{r setup}
library(wk4package)
```

The FARS functions are a set a functions surrounding accident data recovered from the Fatality Analysis Reporting System from the US' NHTSA. They generally load, summarize, and visualize accident data in the format of the FARS raw datasets with the `accident_YYYY.csv.bz2` filename format.
